page.title: 08BATTLEDYKES FARM : STEADING
page.content:
THE BATTLEDYKES STEADING,WHICH MEASURES 30 METRES BY 36 METRES,HAS WON AN AWARD FROM THE{NORTH OF {SCOTLAND FARM BUILDING ASSOCIATION. REEKIE OF FORFAR BUILT IT BUT THE DESIGN WAS THOUGHT OF BY THE FARMER, WHO PAINTED IT A KHAKI GREEN_GREY COLOUR SO THAT IT WOULD BLEND IN WITH THE SURROUNDING COUNTRYSIDE. PART OF THE ORIGINAL STEADING WAS PRESERVED AND THE PRESENT BUILDING ADDED TO THAT. THE STEADING,WHICH HOUSES CATTLE, STRAW,HAY AND MACHINERY,WAS FINISHED IN 1981 AND THE AWARD WAS GIVEN IN 1982. THE PLAQUE,WHICH HANGS ON THE STEADING WALL,IS INSCRIBED WITH THE WORDS{"1982 AWARD NORTH OF SCOTLAND {BRANCH FARM BUILDINGS ASSOCIATION."
{ }
